pullRequest.title: Fixes #4751 - Refresh NetworkTraffic* classes.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Introduced NetworkTrafficSocketChannelEndPoint to replace
NetworkTrafficSelectChannelEndPoint, now deprecated.
Code and javadocs cleanup.
Moved the tests to jetty-client so that also the client is tested.
Signed-off-by: Simone Bordet simone.bordet@gmail.com

commit.message:
Fixes #4751 - Refresh NetworkTraffic* classes.

Introduced NetworkTrafficSocketChannelEndPoint to replace
NetworkTrafficSelectChannelEndPoint, now deprecated.

Code and javadocs cleanup.

Moved the tests to jetty-client so that also the client is tested.

Signed-off-by: Simone Bordet <simone.bordet@gmail.com>

Fixes #4751 - Refresh NetworkTraffic* classes.

Added missing license header.

Signed-off-by: Simone Bordet <simone.bordet@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText:
If you really wanted to simplify this for the normal case of a single listener, you could just have this as:
private final NetworkTrafficListener listeners

and then have a CompoundNetworkTrafficListener for the small number of cases when there are multiple listeners.
